author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-802 Fix display of JVM information - only extract from system properties
and Runtime when the VM Statistics is to be displayed insted of on each

author: bentmann
msg: o Fixed remote repo (LegacyRepositoryLayout searches maven plugins in groupId/maven-plugins/...)

author: acumiskey
msg: Barcode4J generating barcodes correctly for both GOCA and conversion-mode="bitmap".
AbstractGenericSVGHandler now declares use of static final String BITMAP which is used by concrete subclasses and provides overridable methods. for buildGraphicsNode() and createPainter().
AFPImageGraphics2DFactory - painter is not overriden but is now instead prepared for y-axis inversion.
Inlining now only done when the graphic is a non conversion-mode="bitmap".

author: nandana
msg: AXIS2-4114 Applying the patch. Thanks Dobri.

author: slaws
msg: Add preliminary support for a "jmsBytes" wire format to see what the issues are.
